This game is either dog shit or fun. There is no in-between. If you are lucky enough to not get cheaters and get players that are actually the same skill  level as you then the game is fun. 90% of the time you get players that are way worse than you or way better than you (and 25% of the time someone is cheating). Would only recommend playing this game with a party of 3-5 and never EVER playing solo.
